# Blinding Bomb (Master Trick)
## Overview
*Blinding Bomb (Ex)*: Whenever the ninja throws a [[Smoke Bomb (Ninja Trick)|smoke bomb]], all living creatures in the cloud must make a Fortitude save or be [[Blinded|blinded]] by the black smoke for 1d4 rounds. The DC of this saving throw is equal to 10 + 1/2 the ninja’s level + the ninja’s Charisma modifier. This trick cannot be combined with a [[Choking Bomb (Ninja Trick)|choking bomb]], but the ninja can combine a blinding bomb with a [[Poison Bomb (Ninja Trick)|poison bomb]]. The ninja must have the [[Choking Bomb (Ninja Trick)|choking bomb]] ninja trick before selecting this trick.

**Source:** Ultimate Combat, pg. 17
